data.event: The area was first settled around 1810.
The town of Stockton was formed in 1821 from territory taken from the town of Chautauqua.
In 1850, the town was increased in size by territory from the town of Ellery.

event.title: was annexed by the village of Cassadaga in the early 1920s

data.event: Burnhams â€“ A hamlet west of Cassadaga village on County Road 58 and at the south end of Cassadaga Lake that was annexed by the village of Cassadaga in the early 1920s.
